themes: Emergency financial support for art venues
Quality and community involvement as funding criteria
key_phrases: Emergency grants for important art venues
lost critical funding due the loss of NEA grants
grants based on the quality of work and community involvement rather than tourism
grants whose metrics are overseen by people who know alot about art and Austin's art ecosystem
barriers_identified: Lack of expert oversight in grant evaluation
solutions_proposed: Emergency grants for art venues losing critical funding
Grants based on quality of work and community involvement
Grant metrics overseen by knowledgeable art ecosystem experts
